traits.Amphibious: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.
actions.Acid Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
